sn36.17:1.1: Atha kho sambahulā bhikkhū yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṁsu; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ nisīdiṁsu. Ekamantaṁ nisinnā kho te bhikkhū bhagavantaṁ etadavocuṁ:
sn36.17:1.2: “katamā nu kho, bhante, vedanā, katamo vedanāsamudayo, katamo vedanānirodho, katamā vedanānirodhagāminī paṭipadā?
sn36.17:1.3: Ko vedanāya assādo, ko ādīnavo, kiṁ nissaraṇan”ti?
sn36.17:1.5: sukhā vedanā, dukkhā vedanā, adukkhamasukhā vedanā—
sn36.17:1.9: Ayameva ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo vedanānirodhagāminī paṭipadā, seyyathidaṁ—
sn36.17:1.11: Yaṁ vedanaṁ paṭicca uppajjati sukhaṁ somanassaṁ, ayaṁ vedanāya assādo.
sn36.17:1.12: Yaṁ vedanā aniccā dukkhā vipariṇāmadhammā, ayaṁ vedanāya ādīnavo.
sn36.17:1.13: Yo vedanāya chandarāgavinayo chandarāgappahānaṁ, idaṁ vedanāya nissaraṇaṁ.
sn36.17:2.1: Atha kho pana, bhikkhave, mayā anupubbasaṅkhārānaṁ nirodho akkhāto.
sn36.17:2.2: Paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ samāpannassa vācā niruddhā hoti …pe…
sn36.17:2.3: khīṇāsavassa bhikkhuno rāgo niruddho hoti, doso niruddho hoti, moho niruddho hoti.
sn36.17:2.4: Atha kho pana, bhikkhave, mayā anupubbasaṅkhārānaṁ vūpasamo akkhāto.
sn36.17:2.5: Paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ samāpannassa vācā vūpasantā hoti …pe…
sn36.17:2.6: khīṇāsavassa bhikkhuno rāgo vūpasanto hoti, doso vūpasanto hoti, moho vūpasanto hoti.
sn36.17:2.8: Paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ samāpannassa vācā paṭippassaddhā hoti.
sn36.17:2.9: Dutiyaṁ jhānaṁ samāpannassa vitakkavicārā paṭippassaddhā honti.
sn36.17:2.10: Tatiyaṁ jhānaṁ samāpannassa pīti paṭippassaddhā hoti.
sn36.17:2.11: Catutthaṁ jhānaṁ samāpannassa assāsapassāsā paṭippassaddhā honti.
sn36.17:2.12: Saññāvedayitanirodhaṁ samāpannassa saññā ca vedanā ca paṭippassaddhā honti.
sn36.17:2.13: Khīṇāsavassa bhikkhuno rāgo paṭippassaddho hoti, doso paṭippassaddho hoti, moho paṭippassaddho hotī”ti.
